title: Rush pnpm-lock-validation.schema.json config file
description: This configuration file defines custom validation rules for pnpm-lock.yaml files in Rush projects. Each rule specifies a regular expression pattern that will be used to check the contents of pnpm-lock.yaml for compliance with project standards.

ruleName.description: A unique name for the validation rule.

description.description: A description of what the rule validates.

pattern.description: The regular expression pattern to use for validation.
